Congress has held its first hearing on last month's Boston Marathon bombing.

resident - became terrorist bombers.

There are over 100 joint terrorism task forces - or JTTFs, which include local law-enforcement officials and representatives from a litany of federal agencies, including the FBI and the Department of Homeland Security.
